tree_update.f90

00001 ! ===========================================
00002 !
00003 !           TREE_UPDATE
00004 !
00005 !   $Revision$
00006 !
00007 !  Exchange non-local multipole information used at last timestep
00008 !  as 'prefetch' for tree walk in freeze mode.
00009 !
00010 !
00011 ! ===========================================
00012 
00013 subroutine tree_update(itime)
00014 
00015   use treevars
00016   use tree_utils
00017   implicit none
00018   include 'mpif.h'
00019 
00020   integer, intent(in) :: itime
00021   integer*8, dimension(8) :: sub_key, key_child, child_sub, child_key, next_child, siblings
00022   
00023   integer, dimension(0:num_pe-1) ::  & 
00024        sstrides, &              ! fence posts for remove lists
00025        rstrides, &              ! fence posts for remove lists
00026        istart, ic_start, &     ! # fenceposts
00027        nplace,&                ! # children (new entries) to place in table
00028        nchild_ship       ! # children shipped to others
00029   integer :: ierr
00030   integer*8, dimension(size_fetch) :: work_key, last_child   ! List of 'last' children fetched from remote PEs
00031   integer*8, dimension(size_fetch) :: sort_reqs, sort_fetch
00032   integer, dimension(size_fetch) :: indxr, indxf, sort_reqowner, sort_fetchowner
00033   logical, dimension(size_fetch) :: key_present, duplicate
00034 
00035   ! Key working vars
00036   integer :: ship_byte, ship_leaves, ship_node, ship_address
00037   integer*8 :: ship_next, ship_key
00038   integer :: recv_byte, recv_leaves, recv_node, recv_address
00039   integer*8 :: recv_next, recv_key, recv_parent
00040   integer*8 :: kparent, kin, search_key
00041   integer :: nodchild, nlast_child, newtwig, newleaf, hashaddr, nuniq, npar, nabsent
00042   integer :: cchild, nchild, node_addr, addr_parent, child_byte
00043   integer :: i, j, k, ic, ipe, iwait, inner_pass, nhops, nreqs_new, nreqs_old, nfetch_new         ! loop counters
00044   integer :: iofile, sum_reqs, sum_fetch
00045   integer :: size_remove, nreq_max, nfetch_max,  timestamp, send_prop_count, recv_count, nnot_local
00046   character*1 :: ctick
00047   character(30) :: cfile, ccol1, ccol2, ccol0
00048   integer, save :: sumfetches
00049 
00050   ! external functions
00051   integer :: key2addr        ! Mapping function to get hash table address from key
00052   integer*8 :: next_node   ! Function to get next node key for local tree walk
00053   logical :: key_local   ! Tests whether key present in local # table
00054   logical :: update_debug=.false.
00055 
00056   iofile = ipefile
00057 !  iofile = 6
00058   !
00059   if (update_debug) write(iofile,'(/a,i6)') 'TREE NONLOCAL UPDATE for timestep ',itime
00060 
00061 ! TODO prepare buffers as in walk: requested_keys 1D; needs sorting first
00062 
00063 ! nfetch_total(ipe) contains the # key fetches
00064 ! nreqs_total(ipe) contains the # key requests
00065 
00066 
00067 
00068      call MPI_BARRIER( MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )   ! Wait for other PEs to catch up
00069 
00070 
00071      ! Sort fetched and requested_keys according to owner
00072 
00073      if (sum_ships>0) call indexsort(requested_owner, indxr, sum_ships, maxaddress)
00074      if (sum_fetches>0) call indexsort(fetched_owner, indxf, sum_fetches, maxaddress)
00075 
00076      do i=1,sum_ships
00077         sort_reqs(i)=requested_keys(indxr(i))
00078         sort_reqowner(i)=requested_owner(indxr(i))
00079      end do
00080 
00081      do i=1,sum_fetches
00082         sort_fetch(i)=fetched_keys(indxf(i))
00083         sort_fetchowner(i)=fetched_owner(indxf(i))
00084      end do
00085 
00086      ! Derive strides needed for all2all
00087 
00088      sstrides = (/ 0, nfetch_total(0), ( SUM( nfetch_total(0:i-1) ),i=2,num_pe-1 ) /)
00089      rstrides = (/ 0, nreqs_total(0), ( SUM( nreqs_total(0:i-1) ),i=2,num_pe-1 ) /)
00090 
00091      if (update_debug) then
00092         write (ipefile,*) '# keys to ship: ',sum_ships,nreqs_total(0:num_pe-1)
00093         write (ipefile,*) ' ship strides: ',rstrides(0:num_pe-1)
00094 !        write(ipefile,'(a/(i5,i20))') 'unsorted: ',(requested_owner(i),requested_keys(i),i=1,sum_ships)
00095         write(ipefile,'(a/(i5,o15))') 'sorted: ',(sort_reqowner(i),sort_reqs(i),i=1,sum_ships)
00096         write (ipefile,*) ' # fetches: ',sum_fetches,nfetch_total(0:num_pe-1)
00097         write (ipefile,*) ' fetch strides: ',sstrides(0:num_pe-1)
00098         write(ipefile,'(a/(2i5,o15))') 'fetches ',(i,sort_fetchowner(i),sort_fetch(i),i=1,sum_fetches)
00099      endif
00100 
00101 !if (itime==4) call cleanup
00102      ! Now have complete list of requests from all PEs in rank order.
00103      ! -- ready for all-to-all multipole swap
00104 
00105 
00106   ! Prepare send buffer with sorted shipping list: pack multipole info together as in tree_walk.
00107 
00108   do i=1,sum_ships
00109         ship_key = sort_reqs(i)
00110         ship_address = key2addr(ship_key,'UPDATE: pack1 ')  ! # address
00111         ship_node = htable(ship_address)%node
00112         ship_byte = IAND( htable( ship_address )%childcode,255 ) ! Catch lowest 8 bits of childbyte - filter off requested and here flags 
00113         ship_leaves = htable( ship_address )%leaves                    ! # contained leaves
00114 
00115         !  Need to reset ship_next=-1 if node is last of children
00116         kparent = ishft(ship_key ,-3 )
00117         addr_parent = key2addr(kparent,'UPDATE: pack2 ')
00118         child_byte = htable( addr_parent )%childcode            !  Children byte-code
00119         nchild = SUM( (/ (ibits(child_byte,j,1),j=0,7) /) )       ! # children = sum of bits in byte-code
00120         child_sub(1:nchild) = pack( bitarr, mask=(/ (btest(child_byte,j),j=0,7) /) )  ! Extract child sub-keys from byte code
00121         child_key(1:nchild) = IOR( ishft(kparent,3), child_sub(1:nchild) )         ! Construct keys of children
00122 
00123         if (ship_key == child_key(nchild) ) then   
00124            ship_next = -1      ! last of siblings or only child
00125         else
00126            ship_next = htable( ship_address )%next   ! Node has elder siblings
00127         endif
00128 
00129         pack_child(i) =  multipole ( ship_key, &
00130              ship_byte, &
00131              ship_leaves, &
00132              me, &
00133              ship_next, &
00134              charge( ship_node ), &
00135              abs_charge( ship_node ), &
00136              xcoc( ship_node), &
00137              ycoc( ship_node), &
00138              zcoc( ship_node), &
00139              xdip( ship_node), &
00140              ydip( ship_node), &
00141              zdip( ship_node), &
00142              xxquad( ship_node), &
00143              yyquad( ship_node), &
00144              zzquad( ship_node), &
00145              xyquad( ship_node), &
00146              yzquad( ship_node), &
00147              zxquad( ship_node), &
00148              jx( ship_node), &
00149              jy( ship_node), &
00150              jz( ship_node), &
00151              magmx( ship_node), &
00152              magmy( ship_node), &
00153              magmz( ship_node) )
00154    end do
00155 
00156 
00157   ! Ship multipole data
00158   call MPI_ALLTOALLV( pack_child,  nreqs_total, rstrides, MPI_TYPE_MULTIPOLE, &
00159        get_child, nfetch_total, sstrides, MPI_TYPE_MULTIPOLE, &
00160        MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00161 
00162   ! Update hash entries with refreshed multipole data 
00163 
00164      do i=1, sum_fetches
00165         ipe=sort_fetchowner(i)
00166         recv_key = get_child(i)%key
00167         recv_parent = ishft( recv_key,-3 )
00168         recv_byte = get_child(i)%byte
00169         recv_leaves = get_child(i)%leaves
00170         recv_next = get_child(i)%next
00171 
00172         ! Check new node exists in local #-table
00173 
00174 !        call make_hashentry( recv_key, nodchild, recv_leaves, recv_byte, ipe, hashaddr, ierr )
00175 !       key_present = key_local(recv_key)
00176 
00177         node_addr = key2addr(recv_key,'UPDATE: MNHE ')
00178         nodchild = htable(node_addr)%node
00179 
00180         ! Physical properties
00181 
00182         charge( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%q
00183         abs_charge( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%absq
00184         xcoc( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%xcoc
00185         ycoc( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%ycoc
00186         zcoc( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%zcoc
00187         xdip( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%xdip
00188         ydip( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%ydip
00189         zdip( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%zdip
00190 
00191         xxquad( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%xxquad
00192         yyquad( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%yyquad
00193         zzquad( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%zzquad
00194         xyquad( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%xyquad
00195         yzquad( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%yzquad
00196         zxquad( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%zxquad
00197 
00198         jx( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%jx
00199         jy( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%jy
00200         jz( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%jz
00201 
00202         magmx( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%magmx
00203         magmy( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%magmy
00204         magmz( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%magmz
00205 
00206 
00207         if (update_debug) write(iofile,'(a,o15,a,i7,a,o13)') &
00208              'Prefetch: ',recv_key,' from ',ipe,' parent key ',recv_parent
00209 
00210      end do
00211 
00212 end subroutine tree_update
